author: Hannah Scherkamp
description: Wie funktioniert sein Tunnelsystem? Wann gibt es selbstfahrende Tesla-Lastwagen? In diesem Ted Talk spricht Tesla-Erfinder Elon Musk offen über seine Visionen.
title: Diese 6 Pläne verfolgt Elon Musk

author: Kim Rixecker
description: Mit Roboschool hat die unter anderem von Elon Musk unterstützte OpenAI-Initiative einen quelloffenen Simulator für Roboter veröffentlicht.
title: Elon Musks OpenAI-Initiative veröffentlicht quelloffenen Roboter-Simulator

author: WIRED Staff
description: Elon Musks Tunnelbaufirma will den Stadtverkehr unter die Erde bringen. Nun ist der erste Transportschlitten durch einen Tunnel gerast.
title: Elon Musk testet den ersten Tunnelschlitten der Boring Company

author: Danielle Muoio
description: Just a few days after Uber CEO Travis Kalanick pitched working with Tesla, Elon Musk said Tesla would develop its own ride-sharing service.
title: Uber once offered to partner with Tesla on self-driving cars — but Elon Musk said no

author: Eric Newcomer
description: The ride-hailing company’s chief approached Elon Musk to work together, according to an upcoming book.
title: Tesla Rebuffed Uber Partnership on Self-Driving Cars in 2016

author: Dana Hull, Mark Chediak
description: Lyndon Rive, the former chief executive officer of SolarCity and first cousin of Tesla Inc. CEO Elon Musk, will leave the electric automaker next month, saying he plans to start another venture.
title: Musk Cousin Lyndon Rive, Former SolarCity CEO, to Leave Tesla
